rows.label: bf06230120_0010
rows.name:
This is the very picture of the
ancient civilizations I've read about!

rows.label: bf06230120_0030
rows.name: You know the old land of Iira?

rows.label: bf06230120_0040
rows.name:
Back then, it was a civilized 
nation on par with Judicium.

rows.label: bf06230120_0050
rows.name:
Judicium mastered the pinnacle 
of biological technology.

rows.label: bf06230120_0060
rows.name:
Iira mastered the pinnacle 
of mechanical technology.

rows.label: bf06230120_0070
rows.name:
The proud blood of Iira runs in
the veins of us Luxurian.

rows.label: bf06230120_0080
rows.name:
As there are people to pass it on to,
civilization will endure.

rows.label: bf06230120_0090
rows.name:
Not the inheritance of life, 
but the inheritance of knowledge.

rows.label: bf06230120_0120
rows.name: I wouldn't necessarily say that, though.

rows.label: bf06230120_0140
rows.name: You'll understand when you see it.
